title: Emmerdale spoilers: Who dies in explosive Cain and Moira showdown?
text:
There looks set to be death in the Dales this October as an explosive showdown changes life forever and threatens to be the end of more than one character, with Emmerdale star Sally Dexter suggesting that not everyone will make it out of the situation alive.

It’s no secret that October can be a deadly time in the village – especially for the Bartons (rip James, Finn and Emma) and Cain Dingle (Jeff Hordley) has always had a bit of a murderous temper. Last October, he almost succeeded in killing off Joe Tate with a single punch – so imagine what he will have in store for Nate Robinson (Jurell Carter) when he finds out that he has been sleeping with Moira (Natalie J Robb).

As the affair comes to light – thanks to the catalyst that is Faith – a devastating series of events is set to take place. And while we are sworn to secrecy over what fans can expect, Sally all but confirmed that it would be a matter of life and death.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Speaking about the events at the recent Inside Soap Awards, the popular star told The Mirror: ‘Faith’s not happy about it at all. She’s got a bee in her bonnet because anything to do with Cain is utter important – she adds two and two and makes 49.

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

‘There is a very shocking twist with Nate’s identity and it has dire consequences for my son Cain, for Moira my daughter-in-law, and me. We have to come through a heavy storm and some of us might not make it. It was some of the most harrowingly emotional scenes I’ve ever done.’

Sounds massive and unmissable. But one thing that it leads to is a departure for Sally as Faith.

She added to Metro.co.uk: ‘It’s going to be an explosive October. I may have to leave for a little while.’

Advertisement Advertisement
description: The star has hinted at a shocking death.
